circumstances: Mark Johnson, a 47-year-old male, was reported missing from his home at 312 Greengairs Road, Greengairs. Initial inquiries revealed that Mark's brother, Toby Abbott, last saw him at the residence before leaving for a meeting. Mark's close friend, Clive, expressed concerns as Mark had been discussing feeling overwhelmed due to work pressures. He was known to go for long walks to clear his mind. Despite these worries, it was surprising when Mark did not attend a planned outing with his son, Allan Warren. Police were notified and after a search, Mark was traced to Gallanach Road, safe and cooperative with the officers.
q_5_explanation: He has a disability that may affect his wellbeing during absence.
q_10_explanation: Concerns were raised about his overwhelming work pressures.
q_14_explanation: Mark felt overwhelmed due to work pressures.
q_17_explanation: His absence was unexpected and out of character.
q_18_explanation: He was feeling overwhelmed, which may explain his leaving.
q_20_explanation: He intended to go for a walk but did not complete his plans.
